attributes.action: Ban television where under-eighteens (minors) are made to watch adults undress
attributes.additional_details: Ban the use of under-eighteens in reality television shows that involve nudity.
attributes.background: Create a law banning the exploitation of children as seen in the all 4 program 'naked education' where adults undress until naked infront of children under the guise of 'education'.

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about broadcast standards are a matter for Ofcom, not the UK Government or Parliament.

If you want to complain about a television programme you can do so here: https://www.ofcom.org.uk/complaints/complain-about-tv-radio-a-website
